thread.title: Saskia v.d. Linden
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Saskia v.d. Linden

author: Saskia v.d. Linden
title: Saskia v.d. Linden
text: Ultra-quick delivery of flowers ordered from The Netherlands for delivery in the US. The flowers I requested were out of stock, and I was immediately contacted to discuss different options. Within a few hours after I'd placed the order, the bouquet was delivered.
